title: Armenia Money Supply M2
description: Money Supply M2 in Armenia increased to 2556951 AMD Million in September from 2534256 AMD Million in August of 2022. Money Supply M2 in Armenia averaged 640907.16 AMD Million from 1995 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 2556951 AMD Million in September of 2022 and a record low of 13641 AMD Million in January of 1995. Armenia Money Supply M2 includes M1 plus short-term time deposits in banks. This page provides - Armenia Money Supply M2 - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Bank of Armenia
